forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a blanket of clouds, creating a muted atmosphere that favors introspection over exuberance. The temperature hovers around a cool 56 degrees, with gentle southwest winds whispering through the streets. The San Francisco fog, known to weave its way through the city’s nooks, is likely playing a subtle role in the scenery; while the iconic Golden Gate Bridge remains visible, it dances alongside a gauzy marine layer that softens outlines but doesn’t obscure the view entirely. As dusk approaches, the clouds deepen, settling around a modest low of 48 degrees tonight, with the west winds continuing their soft serenade.

Dressing in layers will serve you well; a light jacket or sweater, coupled with a scarf, can make your stroll through the city both comfortable and stylish. Consider a walk along the Embarcadero to witness the shimmering waters of the bay, or perhaps indulge in an afternoon visit to a cozy café where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with soft chatter, yielding an inviting respite from the brisk air. As you meander through the streets, allow yourself to savor the understated beauty of the city, wrapped in its familiar shades of gray, with hints of warmth in the soft glow of café lights flickering to life as evening falls.
